name: Katalight
description:
This game was made for the Harold Jam '22: Dark Universe: https://itch.io/jam/haroldjam22

Welcome to Katalight, many years have passed since the scourge of goblins first swept this island.

They are back!

This time with the larger Goblins that have more ferocious elemental powers. On top of that, they have corrupted the beasts of the land with their elemental magic.

Join Harold and Claire on their adventure to restore the balance of the kingdom and stop the monster that has reaped so much havoc over the many decades.

The way you react to the folk of Katalight will affect your Morality and the ending will be determined by your actions.

So choose wisely Harold!
